Entries.default: "WHAT YOU WANT?" The imp recoils from you with a sharp hiss.
"EH... THE SEA IS TRUE HOME. NOT SMELLY MOUNTAIN."
"How can I get inside Arkemyr's Manor?"
"Farewell."
"You want to set sail and eat gulls? You're welcome aboard [Player Ship]."

"HOW OFTEN YOU BEAT YOUR CREW, EH?" 

It doesn't whisper at all, and the question sends a ringing through your ears.
"I don't. Not yet, at least."
"Only when they displease me."
"Follow my orders and we shouldn't have a problem."

"NO... BEATINGS? NONE?" 

It blinks, struggling to encompass the idea.
"EH! WORTHLESS IDIOT STAYS IN CROW'S NEST. EAT CROWS FOR CAPTAIN."
"DOORS ARE FOR GROUNDMEAT."
"What are you doing out here?"
"BUT ARKEMYR NOT HOME." A mischievous grin splits the imp's bony features.
"BUT ARKEMYR MORE FURIOUS THAN EVER SINCE HE CAME HOME, EH?"
"I JOIN CREW! WHO WORTHLESS NOW, ARKEMYR?"
"EH... M-MASTER! YOU..." The imp flutters closer and narrows its eyes.
"I'm in disguise."
"I forgot I was wearing this thing."
[Say nothing.]

"DISGUISE AS POWERFUL ARCHMAGE? EH. FUNNY WAY TO BLEND IN." 

The imp scratches its head, shrugging.
"MUST BE COZY. EH... WHAT YOU WANT?"
The imp merely reaches a long talon up to pick its nose, as content as you are to remain silent.

"YOU NOT MASTER. WHY DRESSED LIKE HIM, EH?"

He points a long finger toward your robes.

"SPROUT WINGS LIKE IMP, EH? FLY UP TO BALCONY."

The imp bats its wings bat extra hard for emphasis before pointing at the highest level of the neighboring manor.
"EH... ARKEMYR DOESN'T LET WORTHLESS IDIOT OUTSIDE AFTER WORTHLESS IDIOT SPRAYED DUNG ON STUPID TABLET."

"SO WORTHLESS IDIOT WATCHES THE SHIPS COME IN. 

"LOOKS AT ALL THE TASTY GULLS." 

It sighs down at the vista of ocean and docks.
"Your name is... Worthless Idiot?"

"EH. THOSE ARKEMYR'S BIG WORDS. 

"GAVE NAME, BUT... WORTHLESS IDIOT NO UNDERSTAND."

Worthless Idiot wriggles a finger in its ear.
"I'm pretty sure he meant it as an insult."
[Lie] "That name is a title of distinction among wizards."
"Back to my other questions."
"EH... THAT SO? WORTHLESS IDIOT SHOULD ASK STINK FOOT OR CAT BREATH WHAT THEY SAY."
"HA! WAIT TILL WORTHLESS IDIOT TELLS KRILL JELLY AND GREASE BOY."
"EH. YOU NOISY FOR GROUNDMEAT."

The imp takes in your words, its eyes widening to the size of moist saucers. 

A flap of its wings carries it closer to whisper in your ear.
"Ouch... only when they're noisy!"
"EH... WORTHLESS IDIOT KNOWS WHEN TO SHUT WORTHLESS MOUTH."

"I JOIN CREW? I JOIN CREW!"

The imp flutters in an excited little circle. It points down at the distant shape of Queen's Berth and salivates at the sight of gulls landing on the rigging of [Player Ship].
